previewDescription: My proudest creation, A mashup between valorant and geoguessr.
learned: I actually learned a lot of things
headerText: Valoguessr is a mixup between GeoGuessr and Valorant that I spent a lot of time on, I had the idea to make it once and just couldnt stop myself. Seeing everyone enjoy my website from valorant developers till players made me super happy!
paragraph1: In this image you can see what it looks like playing valoguessr.
paragraph2: In this image you can see all of the different game modes and settings to pick from
paragraph3: This image is an earlier version of valoguessr that I made way before I actually settled on the current version.
